This app needs access to camera to take photos for property inspections and reports.
This app needs access to photo library to select and upload images for property inspections and reports.
This app needs access to your location to show property locations and provide location-based inspection services.
This app needs access to your location to show property locations and provide location-based inspection services.
This app may need access to microphone for recording audio notes during property inspections.
This app may need access to contacts to share inspection reports with relevant parties.
This app may need access to calendar to schedule inspection appointments and reminders.
This app may need access to reminders to set inspection follow-up tasks and notifications.
This app may use motion sensors to enhance the inspection experience and data accuracy.
This app does not access Apple Music.
This app may use Bluetooth to connect with inspection tools and equipment.
This app uses Face ID for secure authentication and protecting sensitive inspection data.
This app may use speech recognition for voice-to-text notes during property inspections.
This app needs access to documents folder to save and manage inspection reports and related files.
This app needs access to downloads folder to save exported inspection reports and PDF files.
